title: vacs config
description: Full application configuration for vacs - VATSIM ATC Communication System. Config can be split into multiple files or merged into a single file containing all sections

selected_stations_profile.description: Name of the currently selected stations profile.

extra_stations_config.description: Path to an additional stations configuration file to load.

ignored.description: List of peer IDs (CIDs) that should be ignored by the client.

transmit_config.description: Configuration for the transmission mode and associated keybinds.

push_to_talk.description: Key code for Push-to-Talk mode. Required if mode is PushToTalk.

push_to_mute.description: Key code for Push-to-Mute mode. Required if mode is PushToMute.

radio_push_to_talk.description: Key code for Radio Integration PTT. Required if mode is RadioIntegration.

accept_call.description: Key code to accept an incoming call.

end_call.description: Key code to end an active call. Can be the same as accept_call for context-aware behavior.

highlight_incoming_call_target.description: Toggles highlighting of incoming call target DA keys.
